name: SUPERCARZ
description:
Drive around and let your imagination run wild!

  • Play Soccer with Cars!
  • Crash into boxes!
  • Perform epic stunts!
  • Practice Parking and Driving!

Whatever you want to do, there's something for everyone!

How

The instructions are included inside the game.

  • Arrow Keys/WASD to move.
  • Press R to reset rotation.
  • Press X to use brakes.
  • Press Shift to use your nitro to go faster.
  • Press H to change cars.
  • Press 1 to toggle reflections for performance

The available cars are:

  • Convertible
  • Sedan
  • 4x4 Truck
